business_strategies.strategy: Create mini products as marketing channels instead of traditional advertising
business_strategies.implementation: Build novel products that attract attention, include banners to main product every 15 photos
business_strategies.expected_results: Brings quite some revenue, gets media pickup

business_strategies.strategy: Focus on SEO as primary marketing channel

problems_solutions.problem: Community upvoting leads to inappropriate content selection
problems_solutions.solution: Switch from automatic most-upvoted to curated selection from top upvoted
steps: Curate from top options rather than auto-select

problems_solutions.problem: AI model switching without proper content moderation
problems_solutions.solution: Maintain consistent content moderation across AI model changes

startup_ideas.target_market: Social media users wanting personalized content
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Need for endless personalized content creation
startup_ideas.validation: TikTok already knows user preferences well enough to enable this

startup_ideas.problem_solved: Cost-effective influencer marketing with full control
startup_ideas.validation: Existing virtual influencers getting hundreds of thousands of engagements

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Allowing unmoderated community voting on content
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Users upload inappropriate or messed up content, similar to 'Boaty McBoatface' effect
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Implement moderation layer and curated selection process
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Virtual influencer project had to change from automatic to curated selection

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Switching AI models without proper content moderation testing
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: AI generates inappropriate content leading to platform bans
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Thoroughly test new models and maintain consistent moderation
mistakes_to_avoid.example: AI Seinfeld show got banned for transphobic and homophobic content after model switch

growth_tactics.tactic: Create novel AI products that attract media attention
steps: Include subtle marketing to main product
growth_tactics.results_expected: Media coverage, organic traffic, revenue generation

growth_tactics.tactic: Focus on SEO as primary marketing channel
